title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the second row is also removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted. However, the second row should remain intact.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Press the Delete button. 2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row is removed.
